name: Inca boulder run
description:
This game has been made with Godot 4.0.alpha2, thus necessitating Vulkan compatible hardware to run properly. How bad did you want that golden statue ?

Try to escape the temple in this 2D pixel art plateformer.

Be sure to post your best time in the comments below !


Informations

This is my entry to the Godot Wild Jam 42 and my first game ever. The theme was "Ancient" and I implemented the following wild cards:

  • Gotta go fast: include a speed run timer

Credits Music - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku Art pack I - https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets Art pack II - https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/huge-pixelart-asset-pack Programming, SFX, and other - yours truly

Thanks to all the play testers (Cookins, Dawk)
